abilities.name: Last Breath
abilities.details: Yui's basic attack behind the target critical strikes for a percentage of the target's current health as bonus physical damage.

abilities.name: Flying Swallow
abilities.details: Yui launches 5 kunais in a cone-shaped direction, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) for each kunai hit.

abilities.name: Whirlwind Slash
abilities.details: Yui spins around with her blades, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all nearby enemies and slowing them for a short duration.

abilities.name: False Presence
abilities.details:
Yui replaces herself with a Wooden Dummy that lasts for few seconds and appears behind a target enemy, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power).

All on-going projectiles will go to the dummy instead and it has its own separate health bar.

After 1 second, Yui can recast Wooden Dummy again to replace the dummy with herself if it's still there.

abilities.name: Vanishing Mist
abilities.details:
Yui detonates a smoke bomb, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies hit and reduce their vision.

The smoke will quickly expand into a circular area. Yui also becomes stealthed and gains increased movement speed while inside the smoke.

The Wooden Dummy also becomes stealthed while inside the smoke.
